selected_quotes: We need to fix the 'reproducibility crisis', but can't even agree what 'reproducibility' is
How can we fix the 'reproducibility crisis' when we can't agree what 'reproducibility' is?
Muddled meanings hamper efforts to fix #reproducibility crisis
Let's play a game. How many different ways can you define 'reproducibility'...?

author.description: 秘密結社紀伊国研究所参謀長。「和歌山の思想」「地域沈静化政策」「知識編集技術」を担当。1986年和歌山県那賀郡粉河町（現、紀の川市）生まれ。和歌山県立桐蔭高校、東京大学文学部を経て、東京大学大学院学際情報学府修士課程を修了。在学中、東京大学新聞社（現、公益財団法人）に勤務。朝食勉強会、三文会事務局に出向。

facebook.title: Muddled meanings hamper efforts to fix reproducibility crisis
facebook.summary: "A semantic confusion is clouding one of the most talked-about issues in research. Scientists agree that there is a crisis in reproducibility, but they can’t agree on what ‘reproducibility’ means."

facebook.title: Muddled meanings hamper efforts to fix reproducibility crisis
facebook.summary: We've all heard about the reproducibility crisis and how it's going to be difficult to really solve. This isn't helped at all by the fact that the scientific community is still trying to figure out just what exactly "reproducibility" means.

facebook.title: Muddled meanings hamper efforts to fix reproducibility crisis
facebook.summary: O que é reprodutibilidade e por que é importante definir esse conceito? Para alguns cientistas, reprodutibilidade é a capacidade de uma ideia de resistir a diversos tipos de análise; para outros, a reprodutibilidade significa que a repetição de um experime

facebook.title: Nature
facebook.summary:
Scientists can rarely agree on anything!

so when they do, folks should listen ;)

facebook.title: Muddled meanings hamper efforts to fix reproducibility crisis
facebook.summary: Reproducibility currently has advocates for one (1) to ten (10) definition components. http://www.nature.com/news/muddled-meanings-hamper-efforts-to-fix-reproducibility-crisis-1.20076

facebook.title: www.nature.com
facebook.summary:
Here's a nice discussion about the definition of reproducibility in research.

http://www.nature.com/news/muddled-meanings-hamper-efforts-to-fix-reproducibility-crisis-1.20076?WT.mc_id=TWT_NatureNews

facebook.title: Nature News and Comment
facebook.summary: How can we hope to fix the 'reproducibility crisis' if we can't even agree what 'reproducibility' is?

facebook.title: Muddled meanings hamper efforts to fix reproducibility crisis
facebook.summary: Let's play a game. Get your buddies together, and see how many different definitions of 'reproducibility' you can come up with...
